website_summaries.verdict: A very effective short-term flea treatment – owners must follow up with longer-lasting flea and tick repellents, however.
pros: Effective in killing adult fleas on a pet, owners report (though follow-up with a long-term preventive treatment is needed within 3 days)
Works within first 24 hours of treatment
cons: A few reports of adverse reactions in pets
Pets often itch and scratch during first 24 hours
Some owners have difficulty giving the tablet to their dog

customer_reviews.title: This in addition to regular topical flea medication is a fool-proof duo
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic and more affordable version of Capstar, which is what vets use. It works exactly the way it's supposed to. It is not a permanent solution, only temporary, because it only kills adult fleas. However, it starts working immediately. Therefore, if you pair this with a regular topical flea medication, you'll be flea-free! Use the Capguard first, then put the monthly flea medicine on. The Capguard will kill the adult fleas immediately and the flea medication should take care of any leftover fleas, plus any eggs that the Capguard did not get, and keep them flea-free. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: You have to try this!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. My one year old stray cat had fleas. Tried the collar and drops nothing. Reading reviews I had to try. I crushed it up and pour tuna fish water and she gulped it down 30 minutes later she was scratching and looked miserable scratching but I could tell they were dying. For about an hour she did this and I could see the fleas coming to the surface and were slowly falling off dying so I used that time to spray everything down with Raid flea spray to kill anything in the house and out on rugs outside. I’m so happy to say they have not returned yet and my kitty had not scratched any! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Dixie girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for immediate flea removal - but keep in mind this is not a 30 day treatment :)
customer_reviews.text: NOTE: This product works immediately on contact and lasts for 3 days. It is not like Frontline or Advantix which are 30 day products. This is a fantastic product to immediately eliminate fleas. But you should also treat your home, yard and dogs with a monthly flea prevention at the same time to ensure the fleas stay gone. This is great for if you foster dogs or have dogs over to visit that may have brought fleas to your residence. Safe for dogs to give everyday if needed - although I don't do that. It fixed our 4 fur babies right up when they all got real itchy from those nasty little fleas.
customer_reviews.author: T. Herald

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. Gave to my 3 cats last night and when flea brushing them this morning only found dead fleas. My 2 dogs bring fleas in from the yard and we have treated the yard and the dogs but still needed to take care of the kitties. My only long-term concern is how long the effectiveness of the pill will last. The directions say to give the pill when you see fleas.
customer_reviews.author: Gruenegal86

customer_reviews.title: Shudder
customer_reviews.text: Miss Meow is tiny but right at the minimum weight limit. She didn't eat the entire tablet and maybe that worked out for the best. After she got the dose she started itching uncontrollably and it was hard to watch her like that. Adult fleas popped out so that was good. However, she had blood in her poop and diarrhea. This alarmed me. She was really tired for the next couple of days, still had diarrhea (didn't notice blood). She got back to herself after 3 days but I will not use this treatment again. Not worth the alarm and heartbreak. I honestly felt like this little baby trusted me with everything in the world and I nearly poisoned her.
customer_reviews.author: Poseidon

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: My kitties scratch and itch a bit after taking this, but it definitely works! Dead fleas start falling off them, and it lasts for about a day (24 hours). This is a great supplement to your flea killing arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great immediate-action, oral flea killer for cats.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well on my ten cats. We have a routine of using this product as soon as we notice a flea problem and immediately follow up with topical flea control product. Have already bought more to have on hand for the next, inevitable flea event.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L. Malone

customer_reviews.title: Great product work just as it claims
customer_reviews.text: Great product work just as it claims. Does kill fleas fast and our vet recommended multiple use every 3 days as the flea eggs start to hatch.... It can be used with Frontline and Revolution. I have 4 cats of different weight and sizes and it worked on all of them. Crushing the pill and mixing it with just a little bit of can food was the best way I found to give them the pill.
customer_reviews.author: SylviaVE

customer_reviews.title: What a relief!!
customer_reviews.text: It really kills ALL the fleas in about 5 hours!! After I got pass getting the small pill in my wild cat's mouth, I waited and then run a flea comb through her fur, and there were no fleas at all! I left a treat soaking in a drop of water to soften overnight and then I inserted the pill in the center and mixed it with her a.m meal (that's when she is really hungry) just give a little wet food and then check the dish to make sure she/he swallowed it. If not save the pill and try again. All efforts were rewarded, my cat Felicia thanks you Capguard, and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Normalissa

customer_reviews.title: Exact Same Medicine
customer_reviews.text: This is half the price of other nitenpyram capsules (CapStar). The hardest thing to do is getting your animal to swallow it. Look online to learn how to make it easier. Within 20 minutes our dog started running around the house, "flipping out". This is an indication that the pill is starting to work. You can actually see the fleas start to jump off. Leave them be as long as the animal doesn't act lethargic. Don't brush them either. The medicine has to work its course and brushing them off will only leave them alive causing re-infestation. We followed up with a good topical application like Bayer Advantage 2. Then vacuum everywhere and wash anything the animal might sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Art Cummiskey

customer_reviews.title: Really helps with the fleas
customer_reviews.text: I like that its not constantly putting chemicals in my dogs. I give them a pill when I see they have fleas. I can give them one pill a day. Got complete control of the flea problem in our house with 7 dogs. And its much less expensive that other flea problems. The problem I ha with Revolution was that 2 wks into the 30 day cycle they were getting fleas again and I couldn't give them another treatment till the 30 days were up. With the pills, I give them a pill only when they need it & don't have the problem with the treatment running out before its time to reapply.
customer_reviews.author: romigypsy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the cat. I cut into pieces, put into wet food, and she gobbled it up. Within 20 minutes, she was going into frantic scratch mode (from the flea killing). No negative side affects and did its job. Coupled with Advantage II for Large Cats and we're winning the flea war.
customer_reviews.author: D. Herald

customer_reviews.title: (Eventually) works well in killing living fleas.
customer_reviews.text: This flea control pill is just that: it controls/neutralizes living fleas (not fleas in any of the other 3 stages of development). The listing states that it is safe to give yout pet 1 of these every 24 hours, if necessary, but I spoke with 3 different veterinarians who all said that would be dangerous for the pet; that 2 per week would be safe. After 3 pills each, both of my cats were permanently rid of their itchy problem.
customer_reviews.author: OneryPrincessTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Adults Only
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work with the first treatment. However, losing it's effect after a couple of treatments. I am also using a topical treatment on my dogs and cats. Also please note that it will only target adult fleas. So if you have infestation, you need to be on top of it, otherwise the flea cycle will continue. This product is good as a start, but not as a sole defense against fleas.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Petru TudosaTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this one star because I could not give it any less. It did not work on my dogs or cats. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Arias

customer_reviews.title: Cats were scratching and definitely had some fleas jumping and ...
customer_reviews.text: Cats were scratching and definitely had some fleas jumping and dropping off dead. However after a couple of days my cats are scratching more than ever....Not sure what is going on unless major flea infestation. I brush eac cat daily wit flea comb and still remove live fleas and eggs...Have shampooed, applied new flea collars, and also liquid flea tx to neck and shoulder ares of our cats (4)....They all continue to scratch...so frustrating. My cats are miserable and so am i just watching them.....Ive NEVER had cats with fleas this hardy! Anymore suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work when given daily dosages as directed, I noticed less fleas after 3 days of medicine.. but then they came back even stronger on day 4. After using an entire package in 3 weeks we still have a flea problem, this was used in addition to flea baths weekly and constantly washing dogs blankets and bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Adjust dosage for weight
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 10-11 lbs. The whole pill was too much for him. I could tell it made him quite uncomfortable for many hours. It did work, but at a cost. If I had to use it daily, he would live miserably. What I have learned is to use about 1/3 to 1/2 a pill at a time. For his weight, that is enough but avoids the discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: L. MacDougall

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We have been using capguard on our dogs about 2 yrs now. These pills are amazing. We have found 1 fleas in 2 yrs. we have small dogs and this works great on them!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Paske

customer_reviews.title: These tablets are a quick and easy way to rid all my pets of fleas in ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog's skin is incredibly sensitive, and every topical flea treatment we've tried on him has caused bleeding. These tablets are a quick and easy way to rid all my pets of fleas in one fell swoop, and is safe enough to give them daily if needed. I do wish they were at least somewhat flavored, though. My dog always manages to remove this pill from whatever I hide it in, so it takes me a couple tries to get him to swallow it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Carey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic flea killer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a LIFE saver! Thank you Amazon for carrying this product! My poor babies had fleas and this is the ONLY thing that will literally kill them within 24 hours. Now, you still have to have a topical to go along with this and do whatever you need to do (besides just vacuum) in the rest of the house. My animals are so thankful and it makes me happy they aren't suffering from itching all the time!
customer_reviews.author: S.B.

customer_reviews.title: works but cats hate it
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple cats, the sweetest most loving animals youd ever want to own..bever bite or scratch..struggle when held...but giveing them this? they fought, struggled cried in distress... couldnt put it in their food because multiple cats. did it work? yes... will i ever use it again? no not worth the trauma
customer_reviews.author: Shamus St Claire

customer_reviews.title: only thing that’s works!
customer_reviews.text: These have been the only that have worked for me. will keep all fleas off the animal for about a week. and I give them second pill after that to keep the next cycle away!! Comes with 6 pills.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This pill is priced right and works!
customer_reviews.text: My cats have done well on this, the only agitation occurred on the one cat most infested, and was definitely from the fleas biting and running around on him. After an hour or so he calmed down as most of the fleas had died or jumped off. My other cat, 15 years older, with fewer fleas because I was able to find and pick them off her constantly, did really well and never showed any sign of agitation as it successfully rid her of the remaining fleas. Now we're just monitoring for any surviving pupae that might jump back on and have given them a pill ever 2-3 days as this occurs. No noted side effects.
customer_reviews.author: vb

customer_reviews.title: It works very well
customer_reviews.text: I used a lot of different stuff to get rid of and prevent fleas ...idk if this stuff prevents but it got rid of them fast ... diatomaceous earth help significantly but some were stubborn these pill worked on them instantly
customer_reviews.author: akilah

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't perform... at least on my cats her in Southern California. And beware because once you use an inferior product, you have to wait 3 to 4 weeks before you can you a better one. Consult your vet if you have questions.
customer_reviews.author: Anna, Huntington Beach CA

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% effective
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was great. My cats didn't get sick. Did not get rid of all the fleas and I had to purchase something else. I say skip this step unless your cats are infested.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Tyler Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Good for immediate relief and killing the fleas
customer_reviews.text: These do exactly what they say. Within 20 minutes or so, I can tell it is working. I use other flea products as well, like drops, but those crappers just survive. I feel like I need a combination of products to really stay on top of the fleas. Between this and topical drops, it works well. These are good for outbreaks when you feel like your dog needs immediate relief.
customer_reviews.author: EricaJo

customer_reviews.title: Cats are flea free
customer_reviews.text: I gave this too both my cats and works really good. My older cat was a little resistant but I finally got her to swallow it. The pill is pretty small.
customer_reviews.author: Viviana Madueno

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great! So easy, just crush it up and put it in some canned food and almost instant results! Within hours it provided great relief to my cat. Definitely need to follow up with a longer term flea treatment (such as topical treatment like Revolution or a flea collar) but this is great for getting a jump on it and getting quick relief! Will totally purchase this product again! I not only use this on my own kitties, but I use it on all the strays I rescue too!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Hutton

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This product did a pretty good job for the price. I like the fact that it's not as strong as the more expensive products. I would rather have to apply something more often and have it not be as harmful to my cats.
customer_reviews.author: H. J. Blaske

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Used on both my cats. Both are two years old, male weighing about 12LBs and the female weighing about 7LBS. Male cat was fine after taking the medicine, my female cat went crazy. Non stop scratching, licking, to the point where her tongue started hurting (I’m assuming) because she walked around after with her mouth fully open. This lasted about an hour or so. She then fell asleep due to exhaustion. Everything went fine afterwards. Just very scary.
customer_reviews.author: eli

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: These worked exactly as described. Within 20 min. the fleas were dying and dropping off my cats. Will recommend them to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Coates

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to work very well.... Drove ...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work very well.... Drove my cat crazy for awhile because they must of been biting him as they died ... But the fleas literally fell off... I musta picked up ten plus that fell off of him..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great as an interim treatment between my cats' monthly flea ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great as an interim treatment between my cats' monthly flea drops from their vet. But be prepared for your cats to be MISERABLE as it begins to affect the fleas and they all bite at once. The cats pant and huff and run wild during this and it is heartbreaking to watch but I know that they will feel much better the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Walton

customer_reviews.title: I wouldnt reccomend it.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my 18 pound miniature schnauzer. She had about 7 fleas that I spotted. Just wasted my money with Capguard, it was pretty cheap though so go figure. I'll stick with bravecto.
customer_reviews.author: RadioLady

customer_reviews.title: Great product to kill fleas FAST!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product...I'm a repeat buyer! I have purchased this product for my cats. It starts working within 30 minutes! It really is a wonderful product to kill adult fleas and provide some fast acting relief for you pets!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie G

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Works !
customer_reviews.text: Work great. Killed the fleas in my dog and cats same day. But it only works a day. Won’t keep the fleas off but a must if your trying to eliminate fleas in your home. My animals had no side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Amyram2

customer_reviews.title: Works Great on My Cat
customer_reviews.text: These capsules work great on my cat. I give one to her the day before I do her monthly flea treatment. This way, all the fleas are killed before I even start her monthly treatment. Result = no fleas at all!
customer_reviews.author: lotsofcrome

customer_reviews.title: The best thing you can do to compat pet fleas.
customer_reviews.text: These work immediately, but if you have a large flea problem, you have to continue treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Wish they had a Two Pack available like they have for larger dogs
customer_reviews.text: I use these for a small dog and a cat. Wish they had a Two Pack available like they have for larger dogs. I use them as a supplement with monthly drops. Give a tab, wait a day, give a tab, wait a day, give a tab and apply drops. Helps control fleas in the house since these guys are both inside and outside, usually 1 or more sleeping on my bed. This is a rural area so outside control becomes a matter of how much spraying do I really want to do out there. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Lita White

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Once I gave this to my dog I saw a few fleas die and then a little while later he was back with more fleas. I read some reviews where you have to use it with something else and maybe so but I just rather go to my Vet and get Comfortis. I used this once before and it worked. Maybe this is good for some but it just didn't work for my little one.
customer_reviews.author: Monie504

customer_reviews.title: Using this and Program Oral Suspension seems to have controlled ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this and Program Oral Suspension seems to have controlled the flea problem for my old cat. My only complaint is that since she only takes pills that are ground up, this was a very hard pill to smash! However, once I did it she took it with her food and didn't seem to notice it was in there.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C. Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly my dog had no problems taking this its flavored im guessing it worked right away and kept my dog free of fleas
customer_reviews.author: Anita  L Snider

customer_reviews.title: the only solution to kill and prevent fleas with cats who go outside
customer_reviews.text: this works on the first treatment for a month or more. We've tried many solutions but this is the only one that doesn't make ou cat sick and kills fleas! (You can see them dropping off him dead shortly after he eats them) HIGHLY recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W

customer_reviews.title: great for an infestation situation
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works quickly and well on adult fleas...great for an infestation situation, as advertised. However, this is not long lasting and cannot be used in place of monthly treatment.
customer_reviews.author: SmileyLoveBug

customer_reviews.title: Works super fast!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is magical! We have a 3 pound poodle puppy that we recently adopted and she has battling fleas. We ordered this product amazon and within an hour we were already finding dead fleas falling off of her. We have ordered this product twice (once for our other dog) and not things seem under control!
customer_reviews.author: ChelleIsland

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long.
customer_reviews.text: Got for my cats. Seems it only works for a few days at most. Keep in mind, these are barn cats but I still was hoping it would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mdn

customer_reviews.title: Immediately kills fleas but doesnt last
customer_reviews.text: Works as a temporary relief of fleas on pet, will not keep fleas from jumping back on your pet.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Whitman

customer_reviews.title: We live in a heavily wooded area so we have to jump through loops to get rid of them but I expected this product to work a littl
customer_reviews.text: I haven't noticed a dramatic difference in the number of fleas. We live in a heavily wooded area so we have to jump through loops to get rid of them but I expected this product to work a little better then it does. I feel like it does not kill the fleas that are left on my dogs after a good bath.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina K.

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a two year old tortious colored calico that gets fleas bad from her dog brother (the host). And these pills work!! Compared to other reviews I didn’t see them falling off but the lack of her scratching, losing hair and causing scabs I know this works. I used this in conjunction with her topical drops. Gave the dog one too In conjunction to his topical so he can stop being a host. Will be buying again for both.
customer_reviews.author: RaGenna Tonge

customer_reviews.title: Affordable flea control
customer_reviews.text: Took care of the majority of our flea problems with alot of vacuuming. Much more affordable than competitors
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Seizures!
customer_reviews.text: Please don't pay less like I did. It gave my sister's pomeranian Seizures. And made my yorkshire terrier vomit n diarrhea, and made my pomeranian sick like my yorkie, thankfully my dogs didn't have Seizures. Although it helped kill the fleas the dogs were all miserable, just try a dawn bath and stick to your favorite traditional working flea treatments.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Prevention not Treatment
customer_reviews.text: I live in the country and our fleas are horrible super fleas. Have tried at least 6 different flea treatments. This is just one of the six disappointments. It did slow them down. I think it work as a prevention but not treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki

customer_reviews.title: We have been using this product for our two small ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this product for our two small dogs for about a year and give them a dose each month which has kept flees from becoming a problem on them or in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Grannyohio

customer_reviews.title: Flea pills
customer_reviews.text: Works but don’t help permanently... defiantly gonna have to order more and this time give all cats a flea bath after the pill and spray everything!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.  Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does not work at all!!!! Do not purchase. I have used it 3 times in one month and they still have fleas. I treat my yard and house , bathe the dogs weekly and oral meds also and still have them. Waste of money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Naylor

customer_reviews.title: This works great. We foster kittens that often have fleas
customer_reviews.text: This works great. We foster kittens that often have fleas, and they are usually too young for flea treatments. Our very said we could give them 1/4 pill. The fleas fall right off. Although, it doesn't kill all of them, but they do fall off so we can kill them. MUCH easier than combing and combing with a flea brush.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Sentry capguard
customer_reviews.text: Our cat had a flea infestation. Within an hour of giving him a dose the fleas were dying and falling off. Just for safe measure we gave an additional dose the following day. No more scratching and not a flea in sight. When used in conjunction with drops and a collar this product is very effective. Being more economical than Capstan was a plus and worked just as well if not better.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Humelhans

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a temporary fix.
customer_reviews.text: Fleas were jumping off fast. I recommend giving them the pill and then going straight outside so they don’t jump off in the house.
customer_reviews.author: M. Behnke

customer_reviews.title: Works instantly
customer_reviews.text: My dog had several fleas on him and we tried everything to get them off. I gave him one pill with his food and the next day I noticed no more fleas. Works as intended!
customer_reviews.author: Naishmarie Lucas

customer_reviews.title: I Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Made our cat very ill- bloody stool and vomit. Also, did NOT kill the adult fleas as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have two dogs these pills don't work at all ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs these pills don't work at all they actually have more fleas on them then they did when I didn't give them the pills
customer_reviews.author: steven haight

customer_reviews.title: They stopped scratching as much and were pretty much back to their old selves
customer_reviews.text: Our cats were having problems with fleas in spite of having treated with Frontline Gold. We got the Capguard to at least give them some relief until the Frontline kicked in, and it worked! They stopped scratching as much and were pretty much back to their old selves.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbe Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: They had many good reviews but were useless when I tried them on my dog. The fleas did not stop for a day. So I ordered Comfortis and it was 100% effective.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: I am not sure who writes these reviews
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and am so sorry I did. I am not sure if Amazon is paying attention to who is writing these reviews. This is the second product I have ordered from Amazon and the reviews said the products were wonderful, etc. When I have received them, they did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Pam C

customer_reviews.title: Good for my cat and dogs
customer_reviews.text: Pet protection in Houston is an all year long affair. This helps.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD H SCIBEK

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Did nothing. I ended up buying a really good flea shampoo that did wonders on my cats! This is a Horrible product in my eyes
customer_reviews.author: Catherine vansant

customer_reviews.title: Prevention
customer_reviews.text: This is all I use with my little Polly. Works Great!
customer_reviews.author: Fulvia

customer_reviews.title: Good For Initial Treatment
customer_reviews.text: Good as an initial treatment to get rid of fleas. Eventually we had to put the monthly topical on the cat to protect her from further problems.
customer_reviews.author: L.D.W

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Cats went nuts in about 30 mins (which I hear is common because it makes the fleas that bite them jump around and die off) and when they were bathed you could see the dead fleas falling off. Will purchase again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product! This actually made my dogs vomit and itch more. I think I would stick with natural remedies.
customer_reviews.author: D Thompson

customer_reviews.title: These work no ifs, ands or buts. They ...
customer_reviews.text: These work no ifs, ands or buts . They have to part of a treatment that includes, flea baths and spays downs for a week or so but I've used them on my dogs twice and haven't seen a flea since!
customer_reviews.author: Ann C. Hunwick

customer_reviews.title: Break the flea cycle!
customer_reviews.text: This really helped us to break the flea cycle for our pets. We have 2 cats and a dog so when they got fleas, despite being on frontline, it was very challenging to get rid of them. This was the boost we needed.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Combine this with a topical “once a month” application and spraying and washing all bedding and areas your pets hang out, will definitely kill off even the heaviest infestation. You will need to do it a few times, but it definitely kills off adult fleas quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't seem to work for our two ship tzus. We ended up having to go to the vet to get something else that did work. Bummed his didn't work but next time we will bypass and go right to the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Seyfert

customer_reviews.title: work good
customer_reviews.text: seems to do that trick it was a pain getting down my cats throat but after several times mission completed.
customer_reviews.author: melvin

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: This product is GREAT. I had such a bad flea problem with both my cat and dog & I love how I could give it to both of them. After 2 days I saw not a single flea on the cat which he had it the worst. I almost couldn't believe it after battling fleas for weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Tilley

customer_reviews.title: my dog become sick with diarrhea for two days
customer_reviews.text: My dog got diarrhea for two days after this medication. I needed to stay home to take care my dog.
customer_reviews.author: H. Rocchia

customer_reviews.title: Not happy or unhappy with it
customer_reviews.text: It reduced the fleas, but did not work as described. We used this on 3 pets and the same results occurred. Not happy or unhappy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I have used this in the past and but this time it did not work. I had to buy the flea collar instead and it is working way better then the pill. I was so sure it would work. Not sure if it was a bad batch. The seller was great though
customer_reviews.author: wendy batastini

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it does
customer_reviews.text: Good for what it does. Kills adult fleas w/in 30 mins for 24 hours. You need to have other means of prevention/ egg killing etc. This price is much lower than Wal Mart and was very helpful in the process.
customer_reviews.author: RP123

customer_reviews.title: No fleas!
customer_reviews.text: This works fast. I give this to my long haired dog. It works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of the Dogs

customer_reviews.title: It was a total waste of my money and I am super disappointed to ...
customer_reviews.text: NOPE! This did absolutely nothing for my pets. It was a total waste of my money and I am super disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Flea pill
customer_reviews.text: Good product, works well for fleas for my cat. A little expensive; worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Waveesprit*

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works to kill live flees but still need to follow up with flee prevention medication, wish it was sold in larger quantities
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Best invention to get ride of fleas yet.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down this is the best flea remedy for cats. You give them one pill and the fleas are gone the next day. I have seen no adverse reactions at all. My little calico that we got in the South had lots of fleas. We gave her one pill before bringing her North and the fleas were all gone. Have not seen another one since. Absolutely love this product -- it is the best invention to get rid of fleas yet.
customer_reviews.author: N. J. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I gave one of these pills to my cat and the next day I noticed dead fleas had fallen off of him in his favorite laying spot. I had put a white shirt down so i could see. I am very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: TECIA JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quick fix to get a handle. I recommend a pill syringe, pill pocket, or crush it up.
customer_reviews.author: momof2homeschool

customer_reviews.title: No more fleas biting my cats
customer_reviews.text: I have six cats, so it's hard to get the higher priced brands, but this works pretty good, if you know how to give a cat pills.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ridding of fleas fast.
customer_reviews.text: I TNR a lot in my area and in neighboring towns and cities. Capguard is an ideal and affordable solution to flea control on the ferals. I also use it for the colonies that I care for.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Emanuele

customer_reviews.title: Feed it to them with Peanut butter. I'm assuming it taste funny because my dogs licked it and wouldn't eat it.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked AMAZINGLY!!! withint 45 minutes, the bugs on the dogs simply disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: Ashanti Thompson

customer_reviews.title: When Boarding My Dog
customer_reviews.text: When I board my dog, I have them give one each of the last two nights she is there, and I give one at home the next night. I used a monthly med from my vet also, but want to kill any "picked up" fleas from boarding.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D. Delaney, MD, MS, author

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: WE SAW LITTLE OR NO CHANGE IN FLEAS . WE WILL TAKE BACK TO VET FOR THE SAME PRICE AND GET THE ONES THE VET USES
customer_reviews.author: Tina M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised, usually within 30 minutes. I put it in sliced cheese. Expensive but whatever it takes.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Tinsley

customer_reviews.title: It works...
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as Capstar, getting rid of fleas fast..
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Muller

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work-was bummed because the reviews were good. Cats still have fleas and used this in conjunction with advantage.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Krebs

customer_reviews.title: Will have to research!
customer_reviews.text: Did not work as I had expected,as fleas continue to bother my pets even after applying again!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: It worked for my 4 month lab puppy.
customer_reviews.text: It worked for my puppy. Just wrapped it in some cheese and she was none the wiser.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Russell

customer_reviews.title: Really Works
customer_reviews.text: Our cat got fleas and was scratching like crazy. We gave him one of these and about an hour later fleas started falling off. These pills are wonderful and between this and a good flea collar I think we have the problem under control.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

product_meta.title: SENTRY Capguard (nitenpyram) Oral Flea Control Medication, 2-25 lbs, 6 count
product_meta.description: Take the hassle out of flea infestations! Get rid of fleas fast with Cap Guard (nitenpyram). Compare to Capstan (nitenpyram), same active ingredient used in the vet channel.* Cap Guard is an oral flea control medication available over-the-counter to consumers like you. This easy-to-dose tablet begins working within 30 minutes. It cuts out the mess and does exactly what you need it to do: kills fleas fast! Give this effective and hassle-free product a try! Available for dogs over 25lbs, or for dogs and cats 2-25 lbs. *Capstan is a registered trademark of Novartis.
feature_bullets: Treat Flea Infestations With One Easy Tablet
Fast acting, starts working in 30 minutes
Kills Adult Fleas On Your Pet
Easy-To-Dose Tablet Format, No Mess, Can't Rub Or Wash Off
